duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and manage purchase, loan and exchange orders for Aircraft and Engine parts in support of Hawaiian’s fleet requirements
Manage internal and external parts shipping to ensure supplier and delivery commitments are met
Maintain detailed records for order, requisition, and part records
Act as AOG subject matter expert in recurring cross-functional staff meetings and communicate updates through reports with various departments
Evaluate and select suppliers based on price, quality, service, and customer support, availability, and reliability in collaboration with maintenance and engineering
Ensure expedited delivery of critical orders to meet AOG and Work Stoppage requirements
Monitor supplier performance to ensure order delivery dates are met, and minimize order and invoice discrepancies

education_certification.credential: Associate Degree in Business, Supply Chain Management, or related field (Bachelor's degree preferred)
Green Belt in Lean or Six Sigma preferred
